snippet.title: Top 5 Changes in February and March • Feudums
snippet.description:
Feudums is an upcoming indie grand strategy game with full modding, player- to-player vassalage and community-driven narrative • a unique crossbred of Crusader Kings and MMO strategy, hand-drawn visuals & the vibe of '90s cult strategy games like the Lords of the Realm. 

This video is a short visual overview of the 5 most interesting changes we added in the February and March updates. The rest of the changes are listed in the changelogs:
• 0.5.2522: https://feudums.com/comment/1071#comment-1071
• 0.5.2572: https://feudums.com/comment/1072#comment-1072

Subscribe our channel to make sure you won't miss our news, in-progress developer videos or tutorials!

Follow & Wishlist Feudums on Steam to show us you're interested: 
• https://store.steampowered.com/app/473750/Feudums/

Get the latest pre-alpha "first impression" demo:
• Links to downloads: https://feudums.com/download
• You can now also grab it directly from our Steam page!

Join the community, talk to the devs or follow them to learn more:

• Discord: https://discord.gg/QgERDnU
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/feudums
• GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@Feudums
• itch.io: https://kalamonastudios.itch.io/feudums
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/feudumsmmo/
• Feudums website: https://www.feudums.com/

Support us so we can do more in less time:
• Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/feudums


#indiegame #medieval #strategygame #simulationgames #mmo #multiplayer #indiedev #indiegames #indiegamedev #gamerplay #gameupdate #grandstrategy #gamedev #uiuix #4xgame #patreon
